text.section:
The provisions of KRS 387.010 to 387.280 shall apply to:
Any guardian, limited guardian, or conservator appointed after July 13, 1990; and
Any guardian for a minor ward appointed prior to July 13, 1990, unless the guardian was appointed pursuant to KRS 387.500 to 387.770.

law.history: Created 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 487, sec. 24, effective July 13, 1990.
